articles.title: Apple must ease App Store rules, US judge orders - India Today
articles.description: A US federal judge struck down some of Apple Inc's App Store rules on Friday, forcing the company to allow developers to send their users to other payment systems in a partial win for "Fortnite" creator Epic Games.
